alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Stone; Van Buren (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 05 at 2:20AM CDT until April 05 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southwestern Stone County in north central Arkansas... Eastern Van Buren County in north central Arkansas... Northwestern Cleburne County in north central Arkansas... * Until 300 AM CDT. * At 220 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Choctaw, or near Clinton, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Mountain View... Clinton... Fairfield Bay... Greers Ferry... Shirley... Higden... Fairfield Bay Marina... Sugar Loaf Recreation Area... Old Lexington... Choctaw... Parma... Hanover... Rushing... Turkey Creek... Brownsville... Formosa... Narrows Marina... Brewer... Choctow Recreation Area... Woodrow... TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
